title: Aníbal Fernández | AS/COA
snippet: Previously, he served in the National Senate as representative for the province of Buenos Aires. Fernández initiated his career as consultant to the Budget Committee for the Senators Chambers of the province of Buenos Aires in 1983.

title: Aníbal Fernández - Wikipedia
snippet: He has held several cabinet positions under three presidents, serving in these offices for a total of over nine years. title: Aníbal Fernández facts for kids
snippet: After the 2009 mid-term elections, Aníbal Fernández was chosen to become the President's Cabinet Chief.

title: Argentina - Politics
snippet: After serving as campaign manager of Nestor Kirchner's successful 2003 bid for the presidency, AF became Cabinet Chief on May 25, 2003.
